description:
In Chicago, Illinois, Mark Connolly and the dedicated legal professionals at Connolly Injury Law provide unmatched advocacy and support to clients across the region with legal needs involving a personal injury claim or workers' compensation. A top-ranked trial lawyer with more than 12 years of experience, Mr. Connolly established his law firm with a mission to deliver the highest level of representation possible to those who suffered a serious and debilitating injury or illness on the job or as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing.

A veteran of many state and federal court trials as well as a number of appeals, Mr. Connolly has achieved remarkable success helping individuals and families recover the maximum amount of finances they need and the justice they deserve following an avoidable accident that has left them suffering needlessly and unable to work.

Fully devoted to your needs, Mr. Connolly will sit with you and discuss your options to help you make the best-informed decisions. You can rely on him for impassioned and aggressive advocacy each step of the way to increase your chances of a successful outcome.

To date, Mr. Connolly has recovered millions of dollars in total compensation for his plaintiff clients, including numerous six- and seven-figure verdicts and settlements. Honored for his remarkable professionalism and outstanding client service, his law firm has enjoyed dozens of testimonials and referrals from satisfied clients.

To find out how Mr. Connolly can best assist you during this very difficult and uncertain time in your life, you can contact Connolly Injury Law to schedule a free initial consultation. The firm also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy.
